title: How much has technology changed in the last 20 years? What are some notable examples? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cybernetics progressed fairly rapidly. Otherwise, crickets. The rate of technological advancement started to slow down around the mid of the 20th century. According to most science historians, the most fruitful period for scientific and technological advancement was between mid 19th century to mid 20th century. Sadly, there are no signs things will improve in this regard. The demography responsible for most notable human creation is on the decline and the general character of today’s people is not conductive to scientific and technological progress.
